name: grooly
description:
It a puzzle game that you console all 4 groolys at all once and the same time, you need to put all of them back together to get them out that factory and head back home.

Watch out of the fans on the wall & other dangerous item, if one grooly die’s, it reset the level.

All 4 the grooly move the same time and move that same speed. 

You mission to put all 4 grooly back together to win the game!

 (if you like hard game this the game for you)
